name: Easy Fried Beef Dumplings (Gyoza) Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: ground beef, onion, scallion, soy sauce, garlic, grated ginger, sesame oil, white pepper, egg wash, gyoza wrapper, sriracha sauce, scallion
recipeInstructionSteps: Mix together the ground beef, onions, scallions, soy sauce, garlic cloves, grated ginger, sesame oil, and white pepper.
Place a spoonful of the ground beef mix into the center of the gyoza wrapper, brush the edges with egg wash, fold over, and press to seal.
Fry the dumplings in oil until golden brown and crispy.
Garnish with Sriracha and chopped scallions.
